p: By taking into account the proportions and IC 50 values of the seven EOs, the theoretical IC 50 of blends were calculated (on the basis of additive effects) and compared to the experimentally measured values. More specifically, the ratio between theoretical and measured inhibitory concentration (IC 50_T/M) was calculated for all 127 blends and the results were used to evaluate the additive (IC 50_T/M = 1), synergistic (IC 50_T/M > 1) or antagonistic effects (IC 50_T/M < 1) in the different EOs combinations ( Figure 4). For 46 blends the IC 50_T/M values (0.81 to 1.29) were statistically indistinguishable from 1, implying additive antibacterial interactions between mixed EOs.
